content: description the sweetpea top uses a lacy stitch repeat for an airy spring look it s perfect for layering over a cami or bralette the turbo yarn gives it a gorgeous sheen and drape this pattern is available free on my blog 1 click the blog link to view the free pattern this pattern is available as a kit through lion brand 2 it comes with all of the yarn needed + the printed pdf pattern 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/ p=1008&preview=true 2 https //shareasale com/r cfm b=1026079&u=1715627&m=72611&urllink=www%2elionbrand%2ecom%2fkits%2fcrochet%2dkit%2dthe%2dsweetpea%2dtop%2ehtml&afftrack=ravelry
